channel.title: Converting a .bat into a .sh need help
channel.description:
i am trying to play this server on my linux computer and i need to convert the .bat into .sh. i will put the .bat codes on the bottom: @echo off
set P="%ProgramFiles(x86)% "
if %P%==" " (
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx120m -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0) else (
"%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx120m -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0)
pause
2nd one: @echo off
TITLE RealmSCape V1 - By Insane
start javaW -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32
exit

item.title: Converting a .bat into a .sh need help
item.dc:creator: @letsplayallday letsplayallday
item.description:
@letsplayallday wrote:

i am trying to play this server on my linux computer and i need to convert the .bat into .sh. i will put the .bat codes on the bottom:
@echo off

set P="%ProgramFiles(x86)% "

if %P%==" " (

“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx120m -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0) else (

“%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx120m -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0)

pause

2nd one:
@echo off

TITLE RealmSCape V1 - By Insane

start javaW -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32

exit
